about_the_game:
Public toilet simulator: Become the Master of Hygiene in an Island City!

The island city is famous for its cleanliness and order, but there’s a catch: To prevent water pollution, the sewage systems shut down at the slightest malfunction! That’s where you come in: the bold and innovative public restroom manager of the city!

Public toilet simulator is not just a business simulation game; it’s a heroic tale of hygiene. Upgrade your shop, place portable toilets across the city, or transform your caravan into a mobile restroom to assist crowds in their time of need.

Key Features:

Solve hygiene crises at concert venues, stadiums, hospitals, and large events. Be at the right place at the right time!

Attract more customers by upgrading your restrooms, raising your hygiene standards, and earning fame in the city.

Build relationships with city residents, event organizers, and local authorities to expand your business and support the community.

Customize your hygiene services with portable toilets, mobile restroom caravans, and even luxurious VIP toilet options.

Are you ready to solve crises, bring order to chaos, and become the king of cleanliness? Public toilet simulator turns an extraordinary business idea into endless fun!

name: PUBLIC TOILET SIMULATOR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 7600K / Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Manage your own public toilet business in the island city! Set up portable toilets, serve crowds with mobile restroom caravans, upgrade your facilities, protect the environment, and become the city's hygiene hero. From events to stadiums, hospitals to concerts, everyone is counting on you!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish
